title: An inspiration for Taric?
body:
If I'm right (and damn it all if I can't find where exactly I saw this), the art assets for Taric are already completed. We had this conversation a long time ago about what Taric should look like, as he's the original fabulous, ambiguously gay manly man of the League. I remember in an old red post about his VU, one of the first things people replied with for inspiration was Fabio. In the same vein, I see your Fabio and show you Kars from Jojo's Bizarre Adventure.

It's perfect. Manly, slightly bishonen face, and long flowing hair. Also large sculpted muscles because hauling around all that gemstone armor must be heavy.

replies.body:
That thread where people talked about inspiration for Taric's VU had a _lot_ of people mention JoJo's Bizarre Adventures, because it's the perfect combination of fab and badass.

But yes. Taric needs some JoJo's inspiration for his VU
I hope riot goes all "Magical Boy" with Him.

I know one thing for sure: his taunt/joke/dance or anything MUST. HAVE. A JOJO. REFERENCE.

His dance could be altering back and forth between various poses Noriaki Kakyoin has done. Why Kakyoin? Because his Stand looks like he's made of a human-shaped gem, and his signature attack is Emerald Splash.
